DOC.brief_summary: The objective current study establish bioequivalence linagliptin/ pioglitazone fix dose combination tablet compare single tablet linagliptin pioglitazone administer together .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Fixed Dose Combination Tablet Linagliptin/Pioglitazone Compared With Its Mono-components
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy male female subject Exclusion criterion : Any relevant deviation healthy condition
